item.title: Nyack College
item.description: Nyack College | New York’s Christian College is a fully accredited Christian college, seminary, and graduate schools. The most ethnically diverse Christian college in U.S. history is the best choice for Christian college education amongst New York and NYC colleges. Degrees at the Christian college, seminary, and graduate schools are located in NY, NYC, and online.
